meanings.definition: The quality or state of being snub.
meanings.sent1: Her snubnesses was evident in the way she ignored everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The snubnesses of his behavior towards his colleagues was quite noticeable.
meanings.sent3: Feeling snubnesses can be hurtful, but sometimes people are just busy.
meanings.sent4: The snubnesses of the cold wind made me shiver uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The snubnesses of the dark clouds signaled an impending storm.

meanings.definition: The act of snubbing someone or something.
meanings.sent1: Her deliberate snubnesses towards him left him feeling embarrassed.
meanings.sent2: He showed his snubnesses by turning his back on the group.
meanings.sent3: The cat's snubnesses towards the new toy was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The snubnesses of the closed door kept us out of the room.
meanings.sent5: The snubnesses of the unanswered phone call was frustrating.

meanings.definition: The feeling of being snubbed by others.
meanings.sent1: His snubnesses was evident when he left the room after being ignored.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't shake off the snubnesses she felt at the party.
meanings.sent3: The snubnesses she felt turned into determination to prove them wrong.
meanings.sent4: The snubnesses in the air was palpable as they walked by without a word.
meanings.sent5: The snubnesses in her heart slowly turned into indifference.
